resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158799</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3212</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Shrek -Lesson plan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Shrek - Lektionplan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Shrek - plan de leçon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Shrek - planta da lição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Shrek - programma di lezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Shrek - σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Shrek - plan de la lección</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a work sheet with questions suitable for three lessons, and which accompanies viewing of the Movie -Shrek. It emphasizes the characters, plot and settings of each part of the movie and provokes discussion about aspects of the movie</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Shrek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movie</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Arbeit Blatt mit den Fragen, die 
für drei Lektionen verwendbar sind, und das Betrachtung des Films - 
Shrek begleitet. Es hebt die Zeichen, den Plot und die 
Einstellungen jedes Teils des Films hervor und erregt Diskussion über
Aspekte des Films</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une feuille de travail avec des questions 
appropriées à trois leçons, et qui accompagne le visionnement du 
film - Shrek. Elle souligne les caractères, le traçage et les 
configurations de chaque partie du film et provoque la discussion au 
sujet des aspects du film</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha do trabalho com as perguntas 
apropriadas para três lições, e que acompanhe a visão do filme - 
Shrek. Emfatiza os caráteres, o lote e os ajustes de cada parte
do filme e provoca a discussão sobre aspectos do filme</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio del lavoro con le domande adatte
a tre lezioni e che accompagna l'osservazione del Film - Shrek.
Dà risalto ai caratteri, al diagramma ed alle regolazioni di 
ogni parte del film e provoca la discussione circa le funzioni 
del film</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας με τις ερωτήσεις 
κατάλληλες για τρία μαθήματα, και που συνοδεύει την όψη του 
κινηματογράφου - Shrek. Υπογραμμίζει τους χαρακτήρες, την 
πλοκή και τις τιμές των παραμέτρων κάθε μέρους του 
κινηματογράφου και προκαλεί τη συζήτηση για τις πτυχές του 
κινηματογράφου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja del trabajo con las preguntas 
convenientes para tres lecciones, y que acompaña la visión de la 
película - Shrek. Acentúa los caracteres, el diagrama y las 
configuraciones de cada parte de la película y provoca la discusión 
sobre los aspectos de la película</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Shrek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Film</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Shrek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">film</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Shrek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">filme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Shrek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">film</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Shrek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κινηματογράφος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Shrek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">película</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
